This game can be AMAZING unfortunately for people like my that love the DM server for some quick sessions, it is frustrating that we cannot get a DM server without AWPs...all you get is no talent losers sitting on corners with an AWP since all they need to do is hit you on your toe and you are dead. ZERO SKILL needed. 
When you find a session with GOOD players that do not need the handicap assist of the AWP, the battles are great.
Sadly, most of the time what you hear is just the sounds of AWP going off all around the world from those no skill players.

Rendben van. Felüdülés mások ellen játszani, nem egy agyatlan gép ellen. Mondjuk csalókba bele-bele fut az ember, de szerintem jól igyekszik menedzselni ezt is a Valve. Ajánlom, mert nem csak a reflexeket élesíti, hanem a taktikai érzéket, és a kommunikációt.

This is probably one of the least featured shooters on the market - most guns can't ADS, you can't slide, double jump, climb walls, or do anything like that.

But damn, it's the best - the entire game is built around being competitive, and non-random. The map design is lightyears ahead of it's competitors (especially Valorant), the weapons are predictable, the grenades are simple, and the movement is fluid. If you are looking for the best competitive shooter in the world, this is it. No question.

After 5 years of playing the game, I can say it had ups and downs. I  stopped playing the game in 2017, and picked it up again a year ago. The is easy to learn, hard to master, and there is virtually no skill limit. Personally, I'm not that great at aiming, but the game sense helps a lot. So, if you are tactical-minded, teamwork focused and good at FPS, this game is perfect for you.
